name: snap_to_road
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mymappi.
Tool description: REST Location APIs such as Geocoding, Roads, Directions and Places.
API description: Given a geographical coordinate, it retrieves the another coordinate which is snapped to the nearest road. This means that the snapped coordinate is found by calculating the intersection between the longitudinal axis of the nearest road segment and the perpendicular line between the provided coordinate and this longitudinal axis.

apikey.description: API key for authenticating with the MyMappi service.
